name: Frozen Hellth
description:
Made for the VimJam03, FrozenHellth is a 2d platformer where you play as an officer, responsible for keeping furnaces burning around the area. Collect logs and make sure to...

Turn the Heat Up!

Controls
  • WASD or Directionals to run
  • Space to Jump
  • Drag your health bar into the world to act as a platform
  • Drag it back from the world to recover it, before it freezes
  • P to pause
Credits
  • Environment and Character Art by OOO Superposition Principle Inc.
  • Wood icon by Smashicons - Flaticon
  • Sound effects, music and ambient sounds by OOO Superposition Principle Inc.
  • Title Font by Kenney
  • Input Prompts by Kenney
  • Original UI Heart by sergey_kandakov
  • Original UI Backpack by sevarihk on OpenGameArt
  • Original HealthBar by qubodup on OpenGameArt
  • Promotional art and playtesting by MissPuppet <3
